{{Infobox Berry |name = Colbur |image = [[File:Colbur.png]] |caption = Tiny hooks grow on the surface of this Berry. It latches on to Pok√©mon so it can be carried to far-off places. It has a tendency to overtake nearby plants. |growtime = 7h 30m 0s |harvest = 35 berries |replant = 5% |points = 2300 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *20 sour }} '''Colbur''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rabuta]], at least 1 [[Kasib]] and at least 1 [[Payapa]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 48 mins || 2 hours 48 mins || 5 hours 24 mins || 7 hours 30 mins - 15 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ColburTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Colbur berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] |- | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || || [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] || || || [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]] [[Rabuta]] |- | [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || || [[File:Kasib.png|30px]] [[Kasib]] || [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] |} {{Berries}}
